verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> after מ֔וֹת <S%H4194><s%> the death שְׁנֵ֖י <S%H8147><s%> of the two בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> sons אַהֲרֹ֑ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron בְּקָרְבָתָ֥ם <S%H7126><s%> when they offered לִפְנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וַיָּמֻֽתוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> and died

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses דַּבֵּר֮ <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אַהֲרֹ֣ן <S%H175><s%> unto Aaron אָחִיךָ֒ <S%H251><s%> thy brother וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יָבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> that he come בְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any עֵת֙ <S%H6256><s%> not at all times אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> into the holy מִבֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> [place] within לַפָּרֹ֑כֶת <S%H6532><s%> the vail אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about פְּנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> before הַכַּפֹּ֜רֶת <S%H3727><s%> the mercy seat אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הָאָרֹן֙ <S%H727><s%> which [is] upon the ark וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> or יָמ֔וּת <S%H4191><s%> that he die כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> in בֶּֽעָנָ֔ן <S%H6051><s%> in the cloud אֵרָאֶ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> not for I will appear עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הַכַּפֹּֽרֶת׃ <S%H3727><s%> upon the mercy

בְּזֹ֛את <S%H2063><s%> Thus יָבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> come אַהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> shall Aaron אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> into the holy בְּפַ֧ר <S%H6499><s%> bullock בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> afflicted בָּקָ֛ר <S%H1241><s%> bull לְחַטָּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> for a sin offering וְאַ֥יִל <S%H352><s%> and a ram לְעֹלָֽה׃ <S%H5930><s%> for a burnt offering

כְּתֹֽנֶת־ <S%H3801><s%> coat בַּ֨ד <S%H906><s%> linen קֹ֜דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> the holy יִלְבָּ֗שׁ <S%H3847><s%> He shall put on וּמִֽכְנְסֵי־ <S%H4370><s%> breeches בַד֮ <S%H906><s%> and he shall have the linen יִהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> shall be next בְּשָׂרוֹ֒ <S%H1320><s%> upon his flesh וּבְאַבְנֵ֥ט <S%H73><s%> girdle בַּד֙ <S%H906><s%> with a linen יַחְגֹּ֔ר <S%H2296><s%> and shall be girded וּבְמִצְנֶ֥פֶת <S%H4701><s%> mitre בַּ֖ד <S%H906><s%> and with the linen יִצְנֹ֑ף <S%H6801><s%> shall he be attired בִּגְדֵי־ <S%H899><s%> garments קֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> [are] holy הֵ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> these וְרָחַ֥ץ <S%H7364><s%> therefore shall he wash בַּמַּ֛יִם <S%H4325><s%> in water אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּשָׂר֖וֹ <S%H1320><s%> his flesh וּלְבֵשָֽׁם׃ <S%H3847><s%> and [so] put them on

וּמֵאֵ֗ת <S%H853><s%> עֲדַת֙ <S%H5712><s%> of the congregation בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel יִקַּ֛ח <S%H3947><s%> And he shall take שְׁנֵֽי־ <S%H8147><s%> two שְׂעִירֵ֥י <S%H8163><s%> kids עִזִּ֖ים <S%H5795><s%> of the goats לְחַטָּ֑את <S%H2403><s%> for a sin offering וְאַ֥יִל <S%H352><s%> ram אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> and one לְעֹלָֽה׃ <S%H5930><s%> for a burnt offering

וְהִקְרִ֧יב <S%H7126><s%> shall offer אַהֲרֹ֛ן <S%H175><s%> And Aaron אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פַּ֥ר <S%H6499><s%> his bullock הַחַטָּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> of the sin offering אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which ל֑וֹ וְכִפֶּ֥ר <S%H3722><s%> and make an atonement בַּעֲד֖וֹ <S%H1157><s%> which [is] for himself וּבְעַ֥ד <S%H1157><s%> and for בֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1004><s%> for himself and for his house

וְלָקַ֖ח <S%H3947><s%> And he shall take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> the two הַשְּׂעִירִ֑ם <S%H8163><s%> goats וְהֶעֱמִ֤יד <S%H5975><s%> and present אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> them before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> [at] the door אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation

וְנָתַ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> shall cast אַהֲרֹ֛ן <S%H175><s%> And Aaron עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> upon the two הַשְּׂעִירִ֖ם <S%H8163><s%> goats גּוֹרָל֑וֹת <S%H1486><s%> lots גּוֹרָ֤ל <S%H1486><s%> lot אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> one לַיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD וְגוֹרָ֥ל <S%H1486><s%> lot אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> and the other לַעֲזָאזֵֽל׃ <S%H5799><s%> for the scapegoat

וְהִקְרִ֤יב <S%H7126><s%> shall bring אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> And Aaron אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשָּׂעִ֔יר <S%H8163><s%> the goat אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which עָלָ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> fell עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> and הַגּוֹרָ֖ל <S%H1486><s%> lot לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> upon which the LORD'S וְעָשָׂ֖הוּ <S%H6213><s%> and offer חַטָּֽאת׃ <S%H2403><s%> him [for] a sin offering

וְהַשָּׂעִ֗יר <S%H8163><s%> But the goat אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> which עָלָ֨ה <S%H5927><s%> fell עָלָ֤יו <S%H5921><s%> and הַגּוֹרָל֙ <S%H1486><s%> on which the lot לַעֲזָאזֵ֔ל <S%H5799><s%> to be the scapegoat יָֽעֳמַד־ <S%H5975><s%> shall be presented חַ֛י <S%H2416><s%> alive לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לְכַפֵּ֣ר <S%H3722><s%> to make an atonement עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> upon לְשַׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> with him [and] to let him go אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> לַעֲזָאזֵ֖ל <S%H5799><s%> for a scapegoat הַמִּדְבָּֽרָה׃ <S%H4057><s%> into the wilderness

וְהִקְרִ֨יב <S%H7126><s%> shall bring אַהֲרֹ֜ן <S%H175><s%> And Aaron אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פַּ֤ר <S%H6499><s%> the bullock הַֽחַטָּאת֙ <S%H2403><s%> of the sin offering אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which ל֔וֹ וְכִפֶּ֥ר <S%H3722><s%> which [is] for himself and shall make an atonement בַּֽעֲד֖וֹ <S%H1157><s%> about וּבְעַ֣ד <S%H1157><s%> and for בֵּית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> for himself and for his house וְשָׁחַ֛ט <S%H7819><s%> and shall kill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פַּ֥ר <S%H6499><s%> the bullock הַֽחַטָּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> of the sin offering אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which לֽוֹ׃

וְלָקַ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> And he shall take מְלֹֽא־ <S%H4393><s%> full הַ֠מַּחְתָּה <S%H4289><s%> a censer גַּֽחֲלֵי־ <S%H1513><s%> coals אֵ֞שׁ <S%H784><s%> of fire מֵעַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> upon הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H4196><s%> from off the altar מִלִּפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וּמְלֹ֣א <S%H4393><s%> full חָפְנָ֔יו <S%H2651><s%> and his hands קְטֹ֥רֶת <S%H7004><s%> incense סַמִּ֖ים <S%H5561><s%> of sweet דַּקָּ֑ה <S%H1851><s%> beaten small וְהֵבִ֖יא <S%H935><s%> and bring מִבֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> [it] within לַפָּרֹֽכֶת׃ <S%H6532><s%> the vail

וְנָתַ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> And he shall put אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַקְּטֹ֛רֶת <S%H7004><s%> the incense עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> upon the fire לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְכִסָּ֣ה ׀ <S%H3680><s%> may cover עֲנַ֣ן <S%H6051><s%> that the cloud הַקְּטֹ֗רֶת <S%H7004><s%> of the incense אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַכַּפֹּ֛רֶת <S%H3727><s%> the mercy seat אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is on הָעֵד֖וּת <S%H5715><s%> that [is] upon the testimony וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> otherwise יָמֽוּת׃ <S%H4191><s%> that he die

וְלָקַח֙ <S%H3947><s%> And he shall take מִדַּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> of the blood הַפָּ֔ר <S%H6499><s%> of the bullock וְהִזָּ֧ה <S%H5137><s%> and sprinkle בְאֶצְבָּע֛וֹ <S%H676><s%> [it] with his finger עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> and before הַכַּפֹּ֖רֶת <S%H3727><s%> upon the mercy seat קֵ֑דְמָה <S%H6924><s%> eastward וְלִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> front הַכַּפֹּ֗רֶת <S%H3727><s%> the mercy seat יַזֶּ֧ה <S%H5137><s%> shall he sprinkle שֶֽׁבַע־ <S%H7651><s%> seven פְּעָמִ֛ים <S%H6471><s%> times מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> some הַדָּ֖ם <S%H1818><s%> of the blood בְּאֶצְבָּעֽוֹ׃ <S%H676><s%> with his finger

וְשָׁחַ֞ט <S%H7819><s%> Then shall he kill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׂעִ֤יר <S%H8163><s%> the goat הַֽחַטָּאת֙ <S%H2403><s%> of the sin offering אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which לָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> that [is] for the people וְהֵבִיא֙ <S%H935><s%> and bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּמ֔וֹ <S%H1818><s%> his blood אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מִבֵּ֖ית <S%H1004><s%> within לַפָּרֹ֑כֶת <S%H6532><s%> the vail וְעָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> and do אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for דָּמ֗וֹ <S%H1818><s%> with that blood כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> as he did לְדַ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> with the blood הַפָּ֔ר <S%H6499><s%> of the bullock וְהִזָּ֥ה <S%H5137><s%> and sprinkle אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַכַּפֹּ֖רֶת <S%H3727><s%> it upon the mercy seat וְלִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> and before הַכַּפֹּֽרֶת׃ <S%H3727><s%> the mercy seat

וְכִפֶּ֣ר <S%H3722><s%> And he shall make an atonement עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for הַקֹּ֗דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> for the holy מִטֻּמְאֹת֙ <S%H2932><s%> [place] because of the uncleanness בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וּמִפִּשְׁעֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H6588><s%> and because of their transgressions לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all חַטֹּאתָ֑ם <S%H2403><s%> in all their sins וְכֵ֤ן <S%H3651><s%> and thus יַעֲשֶׂה֙ <S%H6213><s%> and so shall he do לְאֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> for the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation הַשֹּׁכֵ֣ן <S%H7931><s%> that remaineth אִתָּ֔ם <S%H854><s%> in בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among them in the midst טֻמְאֹתָֽם׃ <S%H2932><s%> of their uncleanness

וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and for all אָדָ֞ם <S%H120><s%> And there shall be no man לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יִהְיֶ֣ה ׀ <S%H1961><s%> shall be in בְּאֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> in the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֗ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation בְּבֹא֛וֹ <S%H935><s%> when he goeth לְכַפֵּ֥ר <S%H3722><s%> in to make an atonement בַּקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> in the holy עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until צֵאת֑וֹ <S%H3318><s%> [place] until he come out וְכִפֶּ֤ר <S%H3722><s%> and have made an atonement בַּעֲדוֹ֙ <S%H1157><s%> about וּבְעַ֣ד <S%H1157><s%> and for בֵּית֔וֹ <S%H1004><s%> for himself and for his household וּבְעַ֖ד <S%H1157><s%> about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and for all קְהַ֥ל <S%H6951><s%> and for all the congregation יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְיָצָ֗א <S%H3318><s%> And he shall go out אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמִּזְבֵּ֛חַ <S%H4196><s%> unto the altar אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> is לִפְנֵֽי־ <S%H6440><s%> that [is] before יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God וְכִפֶּ֣ר <S%H3722><s%> and make an atonement עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> and וְלָקַ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> for it and shall take מִדַּ֤ם <S%H1818><s%> of the blood הַפָּר֙ <S%H6499><s%> of the bullock וּמִדַּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> and of the blood הַשָּׂעִ֔יר <S%H8163><s%> of the goat וְנָתַ֛ן <S%H5414><s%> and put עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on קַרְנ֥וֹת <S%H7161><s%> [it] upon the horns הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> round about

וְהִזָּ֨ה <S%H5137><s%> And he shall sprinkle עָלָ֧יו <S%H5921><s%> and מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> some הַדָּ֛ם <S%H1818><s%> of the blood בְּאֶצְבָּע֖וֹ <S%H676><s%> upon it with his finger שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven פְּעָמִ֑ים <S%H6471><s%> times וְטִהֲר֣וֹ <S%H2891><s%> and cleanse וְקִדְּשׁ֔וֹ <S%H6942><s%> it and hallow מִטֻּמְאֹ֖ת <S%H2932><s%> it from the uncleanness בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְכִלָּה֙ <S%H3615><s%> And when he hath made an end מִכַּפֵּ֣ר <S%H3722><s%> of reconciling אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> the holy וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֹ֥הֶל <S%H168><s%> [place] and the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> and the altar וְהִקְרִ֖יב <S%H7126><s%> he shall bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשָּׂעִ֥יר <S%H8163><s%> goat הֶחָֽי׃ <S%H2416><s%> the live

וְסָמַ֨ךְ <S%H5564><s%> shall lay אַהֲרֹ֜ן <S%H175><s%> And Aaron אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> both [יָדֹו כ] (יָדָ֗יו <S%H3027><s%> of his hands ק) עַ֨ל <S%H5921><s%> over רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> upon the head הַשָּׂעִיר֮ <S%H8163><s%> goat הַחַי֒ <S%H2416><s%> of the live וְהִתְוַדָּ֣ה <S%H3034><s%> and confess עָלָ֗יו <S%H5921><s%> over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲוֹנֹת֙ <S%H5771><s%> over him all the iniquities בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all פִּשְׁעֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H6588><s%> and all their transgressions לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> to all חַטֹּאתָ֑ם <S%H2403><s%> in all their sins וְנָתַ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> putting אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> them upon the head הַשָּׂעִ֔יר <S%H8163><s%> of the goat וְשִׁלַּ֛ח <S%H7971><s%> and shall send [him] away בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> his hands אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man עִתִּ֖י <S%H6261><s%> of a fit הַמִּדְבָּֽרָה׃ <S%H4057><s%> into the wilderness

וְנָשָׂ֨א <S%H5375><s%> shall bear הַשָּׂעִ֥יר <S%H8163><s%> And the goat עָלָ֛יו <S%H5921><s%> and אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲוֹנֹתָ֖ם <S%H5771><s%> upon him all their iniquities אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto a land גְּזֵרָ֑ה <S%H1509><s%> not inhabited וְשִׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> and he shall let go אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשָּׂעִ֖יר <S%H8163><s%> the goat בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness

וּבָ֤א <S%H935><s%> shall come אַהֲרֹן֙ <S%H175><s%> And Aaron אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> into the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֔ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וּפָשַׁט֙ <S%H6584><s%> and shall put off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּגְדֵ֣י <S%H899><s%> garments הַבָּ֔ד <S%H906><s%> the linen אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which לָבַ֖שׁ <S%H3847><s%> which he put on בְּבֹא֣וֹ <S%H935><s%> when he went אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַקֹּ֑דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> into the holy וְהִנִּיחָ֖ם <S%H3240><s%> [place] and shall leave שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

וְרָחַ֨ץ <S%H7364><s%> And he shall wash אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּשָׂר֤וֹ <S%H1320><s%> his flesh בַמַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> with water בְּמָק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> place קָד֔וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> in the holy וְלָבַ֖שׁ <S%H3847><s%> and put on אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּגָדָ֑יו <S%H899><s%> his garments וְיָצָ֗א <S%H3318><s%> and come forth וְעָשָׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> and offer אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֹֽלָתוֹ֙ <S%H5930><s%> his burnt offering וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֹלַ֣ת <S%H5930><s%> and the burnt offering הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people וְכִפֶּ֥ר <S%H3722><s%> and make an atonement בַּעֲד֖וֹ <S%H1157><s%> about וּבְעַ֥ד <S%H1157><s%> and for הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> for himself and for the people
וְאֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> חֵ֥לֶב <S%H2459><s%> And the fat הַֽחַטָּ֖את <S%H2403><s%> of the sin offering יַקְטִ֥יר <S%H6999><s%> shall he burn הַמִּזְבֵּֽחָה׃ <S%H4196><s%> upon the altar

וְהַֽמְשַׁלֵּ֤חַ <S%H7971><s%> And he that let go אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשָּׂעִיר֙ <S%H8163><s%> the goat לַֽעֲזָאזֵ֔ל <S%H5799><s%> for the scapegoat יְכַבֵּ֣ס <S%H3526><s%> shall wash בְּגָדָ֔יו <S%H899><s%> his clothes וְרָחַ֥ץ <S%H7364><s%> and bathe אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּשָׂר֖וֹ <S%H1320><s%> his flesh בַּמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> in water וְאַחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> and afterward כֵ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> after that יָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> into the camp

וְאֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> פַּ֨ר <S%H6499><s%> And the bullock הַֽחַטָּ֜את <S%H2403><s%> [for] the sin offering וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <S%H853><s%> שְׂעִ֣יר <S%H8163><s%> and the goat הַֽחַטָּ֗את <S%H2403><s%> [for] the sin offering אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> whose הוּבָ֤א <S%H935><s%> was brought in אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּמָם֙ <S%H1818><s%> whose blood לְכַפֵּ֣ר <S%H3722><s%> to make atonement בַּקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> in the holy יוֹצִ֖יא <S%H3318><s%> [place] shall [one] carry forth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about מִח֣וּץ <S%H2351><s%> without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> the camp וְשָׂרְפ֣וּ <S%H8313><s%> and they shall burn בָאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> in the fire אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֹרֹתָ֥ם <S%H5785><s%> their skins וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּשָׂרָ֖ם <S%H1320><s%> and their flesh וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּרְשָֽׁם׃ <S%H6569><s%> and their dung

וְהַשֹּׂרֵ֣ף <S%H8313><s%> And he that burneth אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> יְכַבֵּ֣ס <S%H3526><s%> them shall wash בְּגָדָ֔יו <S%H899><s%> his clothes וְרָחַ֥ץ <S%H7364><s%> and bathe אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּשָׂר֖וֹ <S%H1320><s%> his flesh בַּמָּ֑יִם <S%H4325><s%> in water וְאַחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> and afterward כֵ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> after that יָב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> he shall come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into הַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> into the camp

וְהָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֖ם לְחֻקַּ֣ת <S%H2708><s%> And [this] shall be a statute עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַ֠שְּׁבִיעִי <S%H7637><s%> unto you [that] in the seventh בֶּֽעָשׂ֨וֹר <S%H6218><s%> on the tenth לַחֹ֜דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> [day] of the month תְּעַנּ֣וּ <S%H6031><s%> ye shall afflict אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשֹֽׁתֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H5315><s%> your souls וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any מְלָאכָה֙ <S%H4399><s%> no work לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> and not תַעֲשׂ֔וּ <S%H6213><s%> and do הָֽאֶזְרָ֔ח <S%H249><s%> at all [whether it be] one of your own country וְהַגֵּ֖ר <S%H1616><s%> or a stranger הַגָּ֥ר <S%H1481><s%> that sojourneth בְּתוֹכְכֶֽם׃ <S%H8432><s%> among

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> For on that day הַזֶּ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> this יְכַפֵּ֥ר <S%H3722><s%> shall [the priest] make an atonement עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> and לְטַהֵ֣ר <S%H2891><s%> for you to cleanse אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> מִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all חַטֹּ֣אתֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H2403><s%> from all your sins לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD תִּטְהָֽרוּ׃ <S%H2891><s%> you [that] ye may be clean

שַׁבַּ֨ת <S%H7676><s%> It [shall be] a sabbath שַׁבָּת֥וֹן <S%H7677><s%> of rest הִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he לָכֶ֔ם וְעִנִּיתֶ֖ם <S%H6031><s%> unto you and ye shall afflict אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשֹׁתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5315><s%> your souls חֻקַּ֖ת <S%H2708><s%> by a statute עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> for ever

וְכִפֶּ֨ר <S%H3722><s%> stead shall make the atonement הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יִמְשַׁ֣ח <S%H4886><s%> whom he shall anoint אֹת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> וַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who יְמַלֵּא֙ <S%H4390><s%> accomplish אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> able לְכַהֵ֖ן <S%H3547><s%> to minister in the priest's office תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> place אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> in his father's וְלָבַ֛שׁ <S%H3847><s%> and shall put on אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּגְדֵ֥י <S%H899><s%> clothes הַבָּ֖ד <S%H906><s%> the linen בִּגְדֵ֥י <S%H899><s%> garments הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> [even] the holy

וְכִפֶּר֙ <S%H3722><s%> And he shall make an atonement אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִקְדַּ֣שׁ <S%H4720><s%> sanctuary הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> for the holy וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֹ֧הֶל <S%H168><s%> for the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֛ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> and for the altar יְכַפֵּ֑ר <S%H3722><s%> and he shall make an atonement וְעַ֧ל <S%H5921><s%> for הַכֹּהֲנִ֛ים <S%H3548><s%> for the priests וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and for all עַ֥ם <S%H5971><s%> and for all the people הַקָּהָ֖ל <S%H6951><s%> of the congregation יְכַפֵּֽר׃ <S%H3722><s%> and he shall make an atonement

וְהָֽיְתָה־ <S%H1961><s%> shall have זֹּ֨את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לָכֶ֜ם לְחֻקַּ֣ת <S%H2708><s%> statute עוֹלָ֗ם <S%H5769><s%> And this shall be an everlasting לְכַפֵּ֞ר <S%H3722><s%> unto you to make an atonement עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> for the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all חַטֹּאתָ֔ם <S%H2403><s%> for all their sins אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> once בַּשָּׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> a year וַיַּ֕עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he did כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> Moses פ
